H0.text: A ruler is the best tool for recording observations outdoors.

H1.text: A graph is the best tool for recording observations outdoors.

H2.text: A notebook is the best tool for recording observations outdoors.

H3.text: A calculator is the best tool for recording observations outdoors.

A4.text: The Grinnell technique has been regarded by many ornithologists as one of the best standardized methods for taking accurate fieldnotes.
